page.title: 04St Mary's church, Kelly
page.content: Built local freestone, granite, Dartmoor. C of E 13-16th century. Tower re-built 1885. Patrons; Bishop of Exeter, Warin Kelly, Countess of Wolovey. Churchwardens; Warin Kelly, John Glynn. Rector Alex Dick assisted by Deaconess Valerie Dick. Services; morning communion 2 3 & 4th Sundays 11.15 am. Family services 2nd Sunday with Sunday School. Average attendance 20, communion 12. Events in 1985 were joint church & village hall fete, harvest festival supper, four church pilgramage. Parochial fees; marriage Â£4 banns Â£2 service Â£33 certificate Â£3. Funeral service Â£18, burial in churchyard, burial without service Â£24, burial certificate Â£2, monuments Â£3-38 according to size. Baptism Â£2. Churchyard still in use. Team from Manpower Services started cleaning and maintenance arranged by Exeter diocese
